name: Into The Void (itch) (BishopDev)
description:
Hey! This is a game I made for Mini Jam 98. This is my first time doing procedural generation and I had alot of fun with it. Ignore my bad art lol.

This Game is VERY hard in the begging, push through to the first upgrade and it gets easyier.

Fullscreen is HIGHLY recommended for the best experience.
